description: {"blocks":[{"key":"62rij","text":"This protocol describes how to express in E.Coli human NDP52 N-terminally tagged with mCherry and purify it through His affinity purification followed by Size Exclusion Chromatography. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":42,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"357ne","text":"pETDuet-1_6xHis-TEV-mCh-NDP52 (Addgene  ID: 187829) was transformed into E. coli Rosetta pLySS cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":73,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c6rud","text":"To express the protein grow E. coli Rosetta pLySS  cells in 4 L of LB medium (w Amp/Cam) at 37°C until an OD600 nm of 0.4. Next, bring the temperature down to 18°C and grow further to an OD600 nm of 0.8. Induce protein expression with 0.5 mM IPTG and grow for further 16 h at 18°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":28,"length":7},{"style":"sub","offset":108,"length":6},{"style":"sub","offset":189,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ta26","text":"Pellet the cells at 4000 rpm     . Re-suspended the cell pellet in a buffer containing 50mM HEPES pH7.5, 300 mM NaCl, 1 mM MgCl2, 10 mM Imidazole, 2 mM Beta-Mercaptoethanol, cOmplete protease inhibitors (Roche), and DNase (Sigma). Snap freeze in liquid nitrogen and store in    until the day of purification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":127,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":275,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"621B9DAC028B11EDAB850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"621B9E41028B11EDAB850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8A7D080F028B11EDAB850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctkjp","text":"Open the cells by thawing in RT water bath and sonicating 3 x 30 seconds at 50% power using a Bandelin sonicator. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mb6s","text":"Clear the lysate by ultracentrifugation (40,000 rpm for 45 min at 4°C in a Ti45 rotor, Beckman).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d32on","text":"Apply to a 5-ml His-Trap column (Cytiva) and elute with a stepwise imidazole gradient (50, 75, 100, 150, 200, and 300 mM). Fractions at 75–100 mM imidazole should contain His-TEV-mCh-NDP52. Pool those fractions and subject to TEV protease cleavage over night at 4°C by very gentle rolling.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"34l4u","text":"Filter the supernatant with a 0.45 μm syringe filter on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a6k6","text":"After TEV cleavage, concentrate the protein using a 50kDa cut-off Amicon filter to 0.5 ml and inject onto a Superdex 200 increase 16/600 column (Cytiva) pre-equillibrated with a buffer containing 25mM HEPES pH7.5, 150mM NaCl, 1mM DTT at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emutb","text":"Pool fractions containing pure protein, concentrate using a 50kDa cut-off Amicon filter, snap freeze in liquid nitrogen, and store at −80°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Expression and purification of mCherry-NDP52

creator.name: Dorotea  Fracchiolla
creator.affiliation: Sascha Martens lab, University of Vienna, Max Perutz Labs - Vienna (AT)
